author: abdel.stark

author: abdel.stark
content: <@!301186049323958275> I might be wrong but i believe that the CURL examples for eth_getUncleByBlockHashAndIndex and eth_getUncleByBlockNumberAndIndex are wrong in EIP-1474

author: abdel.stark
content: They don't match the returns section

author: abdel.stark
content: They should have the same return as eth_getBlockByHash and eth_getBlockByNumber

author: abdel.stark
content: BTW <@!301186049323958275> At first i wanted to create an EIP for eth_getTransactionReceipt as well. But thinking more about it i believe we can let it as is because there is no information about gas price in the current response. Only about gas used. So IMO that would be useless to add the miner bribe, the fee cap or the base fee. What do you think ?

author: sky.cactus
content: <@!574864862338088960> You should definitely submit a PR to 1474 if you believe it is incorrect.  ðŸ™‚

author: sky.cactus
content: Left a couple comments that should satisfy the bot (CI).

content:
> At first i wanted to create an EIP for eth_getTransactionReceipt as well. But thinking more about it i believe we can let it as is because there is no information about gas price in the current response. Only about gas used. So IMO that would be useless to add the miner bribe, the fee cap or the base fee. What do you think ?
